articles.title: iPhone users, this app will help you lock all apps with Face ID and even hide them - HT Tech
articles.description: "App Lock" is a new app designed for iOS devices, offering users the ability to lock and hide apps on their iPhone or iPad.
articles.content: In a world where privacy is necessary, iOS users have long awaited a solution to safeguard and conceal their apps. While Face ID and Touch ID offer some protection, not every app supports these featu… [+2193 chars]

articles.title: Apple may delay 2024 iPad Pro and iPad Air launch to May: What to expect - HT Tech
articles.description: Apple's much-anticipated launch of new iPad Pro and iPad Air models, initially slated for late March or early April, has reportedly been delayed until May.
articles.content: A recent report hinted at the arrival of new iPad Pro and iPad Air models from tech giant Apple, which were reportedly scheduled for late March or early April. However, an update suggests a potential… [+1944 chars]
